Ntuli aka gọvanọ nke steeti Anambra nke afọ 2003 mere n'ụbọchị iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003. Chris Ngige nke PDP meriri ntuli aka, merie Peter Obi nke APGA na ndị ọzọ.
Chinwoke Mbadinuju merịrị na PDP ntuli aka mbụ, mana e nyere Chris Ngige nhọpụta ahụ ọ mere ya ị gafe AD Onye abụọ Ngige bụ Okey Udeh.
A na-ahọpụta Gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti site na iji usoro ịtụ vootu.

Ngụkọta nke mmadụ asaa debanyere aha na Independent National Electoral Commission iji sọọ mpi na ntuli aka ahụ. Onye na-azọ ọkwa onye PDP bụ Chris Ngige meriri ntuli aka maka oge mbụ, na-emeri onye na-azọrọ ọkwa APGA, Peter Obi na ndị ọzọ.
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ngụkọta nke ndị debanyere aha na steeti ahụ bụ 1,859,795. Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ naanị 47.22% (ya bụ 878,212) nke ndị debanyere aha na-eme ntụli aka sonyere na mmega ahụ.
Àtụ:Elections in Anambra StateÀtụ:Nigerian state and local elections
